backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact form submissions, exposing queries for business info and placeholder traps for frontend-only actions.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-written summaries of frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration with OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with main routes and wraps all pages in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfo.tsx: Component fetching and displaying address, phone, and opening hours using backend queries.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form handling validation, submission to backend, and displaying a success state.
frontend/src/components/CtaButton.tsx: Wrapper around the UI Button component applying consistent CTA styling.
frontend/src/components/DesignSystem.ts: Central config exporting site name, navigation items, social links, CTA labels, and business info.
Card component showing an icon, title, and description for feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/GalleryGrid.tsx: Components for gallery sections and images with responsive grid layout and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/PricingCard.tsx: A pricing card component displaying a title, optional price, feature list, and a button linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCard.tsx: Shows a program with an image, title, and description inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: A layout wrapper that renders a section with padding and a container.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a responsive navigation header with desktop and mobile menus and a join button.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps the page with a header, footer, and main content area.
Displays a testimonial with rating stars, quote text, and author details.
frontend/src/components/TrainerCard.tsx: Shows trainer info including image, name, specialty, and qualification highlights.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and provides a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and stored identities through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Sets the document title based on the provided page title and restores it on cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for submitting contact forms and fetching business info via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, dark theme variables, global typography, scrollbars, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero, mission, values, and story sections using images and styled content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form, business info, and quick-action buttons for WhatsApp, calling, and maps.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows categorized image galleries of the gym interior, workouts, equipment, and clients.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero banner, feature highlights, and sections for workouts and testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Presents membership plans with pricing cards and a benefits section.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Lists all training programs using ProgramCard components in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/pages/TrainersPage.tsx: Displays trainer profiles and an info section about their expertise and guidance.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, typography, container queries, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state and requirements for a gym marketing website, including images, features, and architectural notes.
